attributes.action: Make Politics a core subject in school.
attributes.additional_details: Its vital that our children get a political education
attributes.background:
It is crazy that in 2021 we still teach religion as a core subject but you will only get a political education if you self teach or pay for it through private school.
This needs to end so our children can make informed political choices and not be persuaded by media propaganda

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573999
